DOC.brief_summary: Background : - New Nordic diet guideline advocate reduction consumption protein animal source beef pork , due environmental concern . - Instead , intake protein vegetable source legumes pulse increase . - A previous study show meal enrich vegetable protein increase subjective sensation satiety decrease hunger ad libitum energy intake ( EI ) compare animal protein . - This study , however , document vegetable protein per se satiate animal protein vegetable meal high fiber content . Fiber likely confounder . - The protein egg sparingly investigate relation appetite . Few study find eggs high satiety index investigation need . Objective : - To examine vegetable protein ( bean peas ) suppress subjective appetite ( VAS ad libitum energy intake ) compare isocaloric meal enrich either red meat egg similar distribution macronutrients content dietary fiber . Design : Single-blind randomized 4-way crossover meal study Subjects : 33 young healthy men ( Age : 18-50 year ; BMI : 19-30 kg/m2 ) . Expected completers : n=30 . End point : 1 . Subjective appetite ( VAS ) ( every 30 min 3 hour ) 2 . Ad libitum EI ( 3 hour lunch test meal )
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effect Animal Vegetable Protein Rich Meals With Comparable Dietary Fibers Content Appetite Sensation Energy Intake
DOC.criteria: Healthy BMI : 18.530.0 kg/m2 Weight stable ( within +/ 3 kg ) two month prior study inclusion , Nonsmoking Nonathletic ( < 10 h hard physical activity ) BMI > 30 kg/m2 Change smoking status Daily frequent use medication affect appetite Suffering metabolic diseases Suffering psychiatric disease Suffering clinical condition , would make subject unfit participate study alcohol drug abuse food allergy relevance test meal
